rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C135697

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PODCI Adolescent Self-Reported Version Test Name Terminology

definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported Version test name.

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Self-Reported - During the last week, how happy have you been with: Your ability to do the same things your friends do?

terms.submissionValue: PODCI3-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
